Name: Make It Rain
Effect: Area Move. Reduce the User's Special by 2. At the end of the battle give the User and every Trainer whose Pokemon was hit, Money equal to their Rank: Starter/Rookie - 100 Standard - 250 Advanced - 500 Ace or more - 1000
Description: The Pokémon calls a rain of gold to fall from the sky. All the greedy Pokémon who threw themselves at the money get in range for an explosion of golden light. Worth it!
